experiences.title: Rila Monastery & Mountain Hike
experiences.teaser: Discover Bulgaria's most iconic monastery nestled in the Rila Mountains, combined with scenic hiking trails and mountain cuisine.

experiences.title: Historic Plovdiv & Wine Experience
experiences.teaser: Explore Plovdiv’s cobblestone old town, Roman amphitheater, and nearby vineyards producing Bulgaria’s finest wines.

experiences.title: Black Sea Coast Getaway
experiences.teaser: Relax on Bulgaria’s Black Sea coast with ancient seaside towns, golden beaches, and fresh local seafood.

articles.title: Top Bulgarian Mountain Trails
articles.body: Bulgaria offers stunning hiking routes across Rila, Pirin, and the Rhodope Mountains. The Rila Seven Lakes trail and Musala Peak are among the most scenic.

articles.title: Exploring Bulgaria’s Ancient Cities
articles.body: Plovdiv and Veliko Tarnovo preserve centuries of history with Roman ruins, fortress walls, and charming old towns filled with art and culture.

articles.title: Best Time to Visit Bulgaria
articles.body: May to September is ideal for the coast and outdoor adventures, while winter months offer excellent ski conditions in Bansko and Borovets.

packages.description: Enjoy Bulgaria’s beautiful beaches with wellness spa, seafood dinners, and coastal tours
